snippet.title: GRID FORCE: MASK OF THE GODDESS - Trailer 2021
snippet.description:
Grid Force - Mask of the Goddes is a beautifully hand-drawn, grid-based Action/RPG where you fight, recruit and unlock the powers of over 35 female warriors in a race to cure the sickness that is killing the Goddesses of the world. 

Move rapidly around the grid-shaped arenas, avoiding deadly attacks and dynamically swapping units, using their abilities to defeat over 100 foes infesting the world of Gora.

Grid Force - Mask of the Goddes offers a branching storyline where all character narratives influence each other in unexpected ways.

● Wishlist on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1379960/Grid_Fight__Mask_of_the_Goddess/
● Join Discord: https://discord.com/invite/grid-fight
● Follow on Twitter: https://twitter.com/Playtra_Games
